medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful, swollen right leg and persistent shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after climbing Mt. Kilimanjaro, duration unspecified, with features of dehydration and altitude sickness. The patient was diagnosed with right iliofemoral vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Oral contraceptive use; dehydration and altitude sickness during mountain climbing.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal grandmother had DVT after total hip replacement; mother and sister have protein C deficiency.
